title: New: Ant-Live – Freshman
content:
Photo by Erika Braukis

Seventy six seconds of music isn’t much to judge an artist upon, so I’m going to attempt to not make any overzealous or extrovert statements regarding Ant-Live and his debut ‘track’ Freshman. Opening with a Public Enemy sample, Ant-Live then settles into a smooth and intelligent flow, delivering in an almost freestyle manner. So that’s it, just over a minute, yet it’s long enough to have me on the edge of my seat, eagerly anticipating more.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
